mcq.statement: Choose the correct sentence:   A) Mr. Asim is teacher of my English.   B) Mr. Asim is my English teacher.   C) Mr. Asim is teacher English.   D) Mr. Asim is teacher of English.

options.a: Mr. Asim is teacher of my English.
options.b: Mr. Asim is my English teacher.
options.d: Mr. Asim is teacher of English.
